title: Yummy scrummy banana milkshake
ingredients: ['2 glasses full fat milk', '2 bananas', '1 yoghurt pot banana yoghurt', '4 large scoops vanilla ice cream', '2 teaspoons honey', '2 teaspoons banana milkshake mix / powder', '1 1/2 teaspoons granulated sugar', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla or banana essence']
